page.title: 20GOING TO SCHOOL IN BUNNY
page.content: Children of two and a half years can go to{Bunny Playschool}held in the village hall.It is held on Monday and Wednesday mornings. At four and a half they go to{Bunny Church of England {Primary School.}The school has three classes, the Infants,the Lower Juniors and the Upper Juniors. Every year the juniors go on a Youth Hostel visit. There is an annual sports day with different races . At Christmas the children present a play for parents and friends. At eleven years of age the children go to the{South Wolds {Comprehensive School at Keyworth.}The pupils travel by bus from Bunny. This Project has been compiled by the {Upper Junior children of Bunny Primary {School 1985.}They interviewed many of the villagers and visited places of interest in order to present a view of village life in Bunny in the 1980's.
